title: I cant log on to League of Legends :( Please help me!
body: Every time I try to log on to League it stops me and says, 'Connection failure, unable to connect to the pvp net, server. My internet is working fine, and this is happening on both of my accounts... what is going on??

replies.body: Same for me in Vancouver, Canada
works now
Same
Thanks - we have made some adjustments that may take up to 15 minutes to propagate.
Still not working for me I am on Verizon Fios in Southern California.
Fixed.
Still not working for me. Charter in Southern California.
ayoo, thanks RITO works fine now
I'm in, thanks a TON!
Hello, if you're still having issues please give us an idea on the specific error message you're getting,  your location and ISP - thanks.

Oregon, Comcast

edit: I believe it's my service provider, I was successfully able to log in through my phone LTE network. While in the client, I switched backed to WiFi, and it said retrieving from server or something, and then the client closed.
Oregon, Comcast
Working now, Thank you.
Telus, Edmonton Alberta. PVP.net failure.

> [{quoted}](name=Korensky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LTBd3M2x,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2016-09-19T16:37:22.845+0000)
>
> Hello, if you're still having issues please give us an idea on the specific error message you're getting,  your location and ISP - thanks.

NA, Time Warner Cable, 

after saying "logging in.." for about 30 seconds it says: 

Connection Failure: Unable to Connect to PVP.net server.
same...{{champion:78}} {{summoner:3}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
same issue on comcast ISP. authenticates then hangs on "Logging On..."
I still can't log in

Try now. It wasnt working a couple minutes ago and I just got in.

EDIT: NVM just timed out
hahahah k i was having the same issue and i was just on it 45 mins b4 it happened downloaded hextech repair tool flushed my dns n everything repatched n same issue hahaha
Same here. Can't log in. Great start to a great day...:(
Are the Riot support guys even aware players can't log in?

> [{quoted}](name=ScottyDoesntKnow,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LTBd3M2x,comment-id=0022,timestamp=2016-09-19T16:28:19.950+0000)
>
> Are the Riot support guys even aware players can't log in?

It's not ALL players, so it's not a riot issue. Best they can do is try to find which ISP back haul router isn't working properly.
same deal here. come on rito :D
I just tried with my laptop (I'm on the desktop) and it had the same issue. Currently downloading League for the second time so we will see. Looks like it's a server issue though.
Yeah, its good to know that its not something specifically with me.. I will let you all know if i figure something out!! Thanks guys
I have had the same issue all morning as well. I have tried to re-install, re-start. Nothing is working. Please update if you find a fix.

You aren't the only one. I have been getting the same message. Installed the Hextech Repair Tool, but nothing worked. The server may be down for certain parts of the country/countries. They'll figure it out, just give em time.

same, i've been able to load into the game fine over the last few days, and now this morning, I'm getting the same issues.

Nothing PC wise has changed (software, hardware), ISP is working perfectly fine. tried restarting a few times also, still get the cannot connect to the PVP.Net server
Still can't log in... server did not respond in Toronto
Is anybody still receiving this error?

i am having this issue 

isp bell

location montreal canada

From California. After hitting launch, opens up invisible window. I can still hear the login screen's music. But no image is on the window. All i see is my desktop wallpaper. It appears that I'm able to click on things that would be there. But once I do, the client crashes. I've tried reinstalling and deleting the launcher folder, then running the client, but nothing has worked as of yet. Pls help Rito {{summoner:3}}

Repairing the install of LoL didn't work either.

Washington state, comcast.
Same. Problem is persisting for me.

It's back to not working for me again. 

Did not receive a response from server.

The login did not respond.

Resetting my modem and internet connection didn't work this time.
Layton, Utah on Comcast; same problem
Fixed. Thank you
I am in Utah as well. It seems to be fixed.
And i'm able to log in! finally! thanks rito.. hope you others get the issue resolved as well.
Enter password, hit enter, and log in hourglass just spins. So Cal, Frontier. Argh
Can't login, California AT&T

Connection failure, unable to connect to the pvp net, server
Comcast, Oregon. still cant login. going to reset router. seems to have worked for a few ppl
It is not just Comcast.  I have cable one in Idaho, and I too am getting stuck at the "logging in" and then having it lead to a connection error.
4 hours later, finally can log in. Tacoma, WA
Okay,I tried the hextech repair tool and put a checkmark on the force repatch. So far its working now;not sure if the tool helped or riot did something.
I'm having the same issue
Do we all have Comcast? I live in Seattle, anyone else live close? Perhaps an area issue??
